snippet: The Rev. Alvaro Corcuera, superior general of the Legionaries of Christ, a worldwide religious order besieged by a sex scandal, stepped aside on Thursday, citing poor health.
abstract: Rev Alvaro Corcuera, superior general of Legionaries of Christ, worldwide Roman Catholic order besieged by a sex scandal, steps aside, citing poor health.
lead_paragraph: The Rev. Alvaro Corcuera, superior general of the Legionaries of Christ, a worldwide religious order besieged by a sex scandal, stepped aside on Thursday, citing poor health.

headline.main: Italy: Head of Legionaries on Leave
headline.print_headline: Italy: Head of Legionaries on Leave
